bacci.giovanni.deunifier.DeUniFier.hash

Interface PointerSequence<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the returning sequence type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<PointerSequence<T>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HashPointerSequence

    public interface PointerSequence<T>
extends Comparable<PointerSequence<T>>
    A sequence that store only a pointer value. Classes implementing this interface have to use a RandomAccessFile in order to recover the sequence using the RandomAccessFile.seek(long) method with getPointer().
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getPointer()
      Return the file-pointer offset where this sequence begin.
      T getSequence()
      Return the sequence.
